author: Katie Hunt and Karina Tsui, CNN
description: Taiwan's top court has cleared the way for the island to become the first place in Asia to grant same-sex couples the right to marry.
title: Taiwan step closer to being first in Asia for same-sex marriage

description: In a first for Asia, Taiwan’s Constitutional Court ruled in favor of same-sex marriage on Wednesday, punctuating a yearslong campaign by advocates for gay rights in one of the continent’s most liberal democracies.
title: Taiwan becomes 1st in Asia to recognize same-sex marriage

author: J.R. Wu
description: Taiwan's constitutional court declared on Wednesday that same-sex couples have the right to legally marry, the first such ruling in Asia, sparking celebration by activists who have been campaigning for the right for years.
title: Taiwan court rules in favor of same-sex marriage, first in Asia

author: JERMYN CHOW
description: TAIPEI - Taiwan's top court ruled on Wednesday (May 24) that a marriage should not be restricted to a man and woman, making the island the first place in Asia to allow same-sex couples to tie the knot.. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Taiwan top court rules same-sex marriage legal, a first in Asia

description: The Trump administration has resuscitated the 'New Silk Road' initiative, first announced by then Secretary of State Hillary Clinton in July 2011 in a speech in Chennai, and the Indo-Pacific Economic Corridor linking south and southeast Asia.
title: US revives two infrastructure projects in Asia to counter China's OBOR - Times of India

description: Trump adopts the Saudi line on West Asia, reversing the Obama outreach to Tehran
title: Message from Riyadh: On Trump's Saudi visit

author: Vikas Dhoot
description: Proposal for Asia Africa Growth Corridor presented to AfDB’s board
title: An Abe-Modi plan for Africa

author: https://www.facebook.com/emilyrauhala?fref=ts
description: The island is on the way to becoming the first place in Asia to take that step.
title: In historic decision, Taiwanese court rules in favor of same-sex marriage

author: Benjamin Haas
description: Landmark ruling will mean country is first in Asia to allow gay couples to marry and cements reputation as beacon of liberalism
title: Taiwan's top court rules in favour of same-sex marriage

author: Matthew Hughes
description: The World Economic Forum just published a fascinating article charting the growth of the European startup scene, contrasting it to the larger tech ecosystems of Silicon Valley and Asia. ...
title: Europe isn’t the new Silicon Valley. It’s better
